law.catch_line: County and district health departments, how organized.
law.text: Immediately after receiving notice of the creation of a county or district department of health, the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall notify the secretary of the county board or boards of health to call a meeting of the county board or boards of health for the purpose of organizing the county or district department of health.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 398, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 349, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2054a-10.
